name: Sweet Berry Crush
description:
Sweet Berry Crush is a puyyle casual match-three game with a goal to match the same kinds of berries to clear stages.

WHAT IS YOUR GOAL?

There are more game modes in this game:

Score Hunter – collect the specified number of points

Crusher of the Jelly – clear the level of jelly

Crusher of Blocks – clear the level of wooden blocks

Sweet Sugar Dropping – drop all sugar chips

Color Correcting – destroy the specified number of chips

Jam – fill the level with jam


Clear all 45 stages to solve the entire game!
